00012 #include <Qt>
00013 #include <QLabel>
00014 #include <QPixmap>
00015 #include <QPushButton>
00016 #include <QLineEdit>
00017 #include <QDialogButtonBox>
00018 #include <QGridLayout>
00019 
00020 #include "stkinputtext.h"
00021 
00022 
00023 StkInputText::StkInputText(const QPixmap & pixmap, const QString & text, QWidget *parent) :
00024     StkWidget(parent)
00025 {
00026     // initialize private variables
00027     mMinChars = -1;
00028     mMaxChars = -1;
00029     mHideTyping = false;
00030     mNumeric = false;
00031 
00032     // create widgets
00033     // main icon
00034     mIcon = new QLabel(this);
00035     mIcon->setPixmap(pixmap);
00036     // main text message
00037     mText = new QLabel(text, this);
00038     // input text edit
00039     mEditText = new QLineEdit(this);
00040     // back button
00041     mBackButton = new QPushButton("Back",this);
00042     // ok button box
00043     mOkBox = new QDialogButtonBox(QDialogButtonBox::Ok,Qt::Horizontal,this);
00044 
00045     // layout widgets
00046     // grid layout 4x2
00047     QGridLayout *grid = new QGridLayout(this);
00048     // main icon topleft
00049     grid->addWidget(mIcon,0,0,Qt::AlignLeft);
00050     // main text message middle left
00051     grid->addWidget(mText,1,0,1,2,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00052     // input text edit middle left
00053     grid->addWidget(mEditText,2,0,1,2,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00054     // ok button box bottom left
00055     grid->addWidget(mOkBox,3,0,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00056     // back button bottom right
00057     grid->addWidget(mBackButton,3,1,Qt::AlignRight);
00058 
00059     // connect signals
00060     connect(mBackButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SIGNAL(goBack()));
00061     connect(mOkBox, SIGNAL(accepted()), this, SLOT(textEntered()));
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 StkInputText::~StkInputText()
00066 {
00067     close();
00068     delete mText;
00069     delete mIcon;
00070     delete mEditText;
00071     delete mBackButton;
00072     delete mOkBox;
00073 }

00075 
00076 void StkInputText::setDefaultText(const QString & defaultText)
00077 {
00078     mDefaultText = defaultText;
00079     mText->setText(mDefaultText);
00080 }
00081

00083 void StkInputText::setCharBounds(int minChars, int maxChars)
00084 {
00085     mMinChars = minChars;
00086     mMaxChars = maxChars;
00087     if (mMaxChars != -1)
00088         mEditText->setMaxLength(maxChars);
00089     // #### TODO #### Handle minChars input
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 void StkInputText::setHideTyping(bool hideTyping)
00094 {
00095     mHideTyping = hideTyping;
00096     mEditText->setEchoMode(mHideTyping ? QLineEdit::PasswordEchoOnEdit : QLineEdit::Normal);
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 void StkInputText::setNumeric(bool numeric)
00101 {
00102     mNumeric = numeric;
00103     // #### TODO #### Handle numeric input
00104 }

00106 
00107 void StkInputText::textEntered() {
00108     emit StkWidget::textEntered(mEditText->text());
00109 }
